news.title: Ukraine's borders must not be redrawn by force, EU leaders warn ahead of Trump-Putin summit
news.summary: The EU says "the people of Ukraine must have the freedom to decide their future".

news.title: Small boat crossings to hit 50,000 since Labour came to power
news.summary: A government minister describes the number as "unacceptable" but says Labour is "making progress".

news.title: Mum of murdered schoolboy Harvey Willgoose calls for killer to be named
news.summary: The identity of the 15-year-old boy who killed Harvey Willgoose is protected due to his age.

news.title: North Koreans tell BBC they are being sent to work 'like slaves' in Russia
news.summary: More than 50,000 North Koreans will be sent to work in Russia, as Moscow's war in Ukraine drains labour pools.

news.title: 'My staff feel unsafe': Pharmacies report surge in shoplifting and aggression
news.summary: A survey finds nearly nine in 10 pharmacies have seen a surge in shoplifting in the past year.

news.title: UK jobs market cools as vacancies fall
news.summary: Data suggests companies are not recruiting or are holding off replacing people who have left.

news.title: Taylor Swift announces new album on boyfriend Travis Kelce's podcast
news.summary: The Life of a Showgirl revealed as the popstar's latest album after intense speculation from fans.

news.title: NHS is over-treating men for prostate cancer, says charity
news.summary: More low-risk cancers could be monitored rather than treated, avoiding significant side effects, says a charity.

news.title: Italian athlete dies after collapse at World Games in China
news.summary: Italian athlete Mattia Debertolis dies after collapsing during orienteering event in China.

news.title: Nepal offers free climbs to 97 peaks as tourism to Everest surges
news.summary: Most tourists visiting Nepal head to Everest, which has seen overcrowding and increased pollution.
